readme:
# Blackboard Theme

A *modified* adaptation of the Blackboard TxMt theme for Atom.

### Modified?

Yes. The comment color is different.

![screenshot](http://f.cl.ly/items/0B0E413G3N47231R2V2e/Screen%20Shot%202014-04-07%20at%203.49.16%20PM.png)
